channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thank You, Tish James
item.description: This is going to be so good.

item.title: Loomered, &c.
item.description: On Laura Loomer and the Trump administration; the Naval Academy and censorship; the late, great Mario Vargas Llosa; and more.

item.title: Senators Demand Obama-Era Inspector General’s Cooperation In Probe Of J6 Undercover Agents
item.description: More than four years have passed since J6. It is time for all agencies involved to be transparent about their involvement that day.

item.title: Universities Get Schooled on Federal Funding
item.description: The idea that elite colleges can gobble up taxpayer money while maintaining total autonomy has always been a fantasy.

item.title: The Fabulous Frick Redo, a Fundraising and Architectural Success
item.description: After its 2014 plan to expand was scuttled, its leadership rethought and made something better.

item.title: No, The First Amendment Doesn’t Protect Anti-American Agitation
item.description: The First Amendment is not a suicide pact between a nation and foreigners who wish it harm.

item.title: Abortion Facilities Are Less Regulated Than Tattoo Parlors, And It Kills Women
item.description: Blue state legislators are more interested in pushing abortion access than they are in ensuring women’s safety.

item.title: On Iran, Nuclear Dismantlement Must Be the Goal
item.description: Trump can’t repeat mistakes of the disastrous Obama deal.

item.title: LGBTQ Christians invoke 'righteous rage' at Capitol during Holy Week
item.description: A community of LGBTQ+ Christians began Holy Week with a proclamation of “righteous rage and holy hope" at the U.S. Capitol in Washington Monday.

item.title: The Leftist American Medical Association Created A Federally-Funded Cash Cow That Fuels Their Woke Agenda
item.description: The AMA's lobbying for politically charged issues like 'gender-affirming care' is all funded by American taxpayer dollars.
